meanings.definition: A group of items viewed as a whole
meanings.sent1: The toy cars, dolls, and blocks together form a colorful ensemble.
meanings.sent2: The ensemble of furniture in the living room creates a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally knocked over the ensemble of books on the shelf, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: The diverse ensemble of flowers in the garden resembled a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The ensemble of ingredients in the recipe blended perfectly to create a delicious dish.

meanings.definition: A group of musicians, actors, or dancers who perform together
meanings.sent1: The talented ensemble played music at the concert last night.
meanings.sent2: The ensemble of actors delivered a captivating performance on stage.
meanings.sent3: The ensemble of dancers tripped over each other during the rehearsal, causing laughter.
meanings.sent4: The ensemble of musicians harmonized perfectly, creating a mesmerizing melody.
meanings.sent5: The ensemble of singers filled the auditorium with their beautiful voices.

meanings.definition: A coordinated outfit or set of clothing
meanings.sent1: She wore an elegant ensemble of a dress and matching accessories to the party.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured models showcasing the latest ensemble designs.
meanings.sent3: His unusual ensemble of mismatched socks and shoes became a fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: The bride's ensemble of gown and veil was simply stunning.
meanings.sent5: The ensemble of colors in her outfit made her stand out in the crowd.
